OOC: DCoburn my base is underground... Orchesta can't see it because 
is underground and inside a lake of lava.... Can you fix it or we 
continue it but takking in count that????


Darkfate/7 bat-brobes/Alecto:::

Darkfate fronwed as soon as his main computer located the pod near if 
his base but in surface, he used his commlink and said

"Perceptor as soon as Drill bit's Troops arrive the base, call 
Chameleon and he will take care of them you join with Alecto to 
follow coordinates... it seemss that apod are outside our base" after 
that Darkfate used his com link and called at Alecto "Alecto, a pod 
are outside our base.. I like the bot... WITHOUT DAMAGES!!"

"YEESS, " said a sinester femme voice

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> Composer/Symphony/Orchestra
> 
>        Three pods enter the Earth's atmosphere, going in different 
directions.  One lands three miles off the destroyed coast of Spain.  
One lands in about southwest Africa.  The last one lands in probably 
the oddest place to land:inside of a volcano located in Greece.
> 
>         --Near the base(s) of the Alliance--
> 
>       A pod crashes on the ground, fortunately(for the Alliance, 
hehehe) the pod takes minor damage.  It then opened up, and out came 
a very bold, sleek-looking bot, who is known as Composer.  He had 
gold chest plating, and silver plating where his stomach would be.  
His kneecap plating was gold, and his upper and lower leg were 
silver.  His hands and feet were gold.  His arms were silver, his 
shoulders were gold.  His back was all silver.  His head was gold all 
around except for his face, which was silver.  
> 
>       "Yes!!  We've arrived!  We will create the music that the 
universe has longed to hear!!!  We will be known throught transformer 
history for many millenia to come!!!" Composer shouted with glory in 
his voice.
> 
>        Then, he looked around.  He had been expecting two other 
pods, containing his brothers Symphony and Orchestra.
> 
>         "No!!  This can not be!!!  How will I, the great Composer, 
rise without a Symphony and my Orchestra???" He shrieked, his voice 
changing to a panicy tone.
> 
>          Composer looked off in another direction where he noticed 
some sort of base.
> 
>          "I must meet these transformers, who appear to have been 
here for a long period of time.  Perhaps they know where Symphony and 
Orchestra went, or even maybe, just maybe, they could help me compose 
the perfect melody!!!!!" He said, his voice raising to his cheery 
torn again.
> 
>          He ran over to the Alliance base, and knocked on the hatch.
> 
>           "Please, let me join you!  I will create the finest music 
to show you my loyalty!!!" Composer shouted.
> 
>          Now he waited for a reply from these transformers whom he 
awaited to meet.
> 
>               ---In Southwest Africa, not far from the Maximal base-
--
> 
>            A sleek-looking pod landed on the ground.  It went 
sliding, but then came to a halt by the Maximal base.
> 
>             The pod opened up, releasing a tall, handsome bot.  
This bot was blue and green all over except for red hands and feet.
> 
>            "I have awoken!!!  Now, every transformer in the galaxy 
will listen to the greatest Symphony in the universe!!!!  I, am 
Symphony, about to be played by the great Composer and the 
Orchestra!!!!!!" Symphony yelled out as soon as he jumped out of his 
pod.
> 
>            "But what's this???  Where is the Composer and the 
Orchestra at this time of great musical ascension?  Without them, I 
will never be heard across the galaxy!!!" He said to himself, worried.
> 
>             Then, he looked at the Maximal base he had just landed 
by.
> 
>              "If I cannot be composed by the great Composer and be 
played by the Orchestra, then perhaps these transformers have musical 
talent within them.  Perhaps these transformers will appreciate my 
great sound," He said.
> 
>               To get the Maximal's attention, Symphony activated 
his com and sent music through to the Maximals.
> 
>          ----Right outside the hidden Pred base, in Greece----
> 
>           A transformer pod went shooting straight down to the 
Earth, and went right inside a volcano in Greece.  The pod smashed 
the ground very hard, making a large crater and alot of noise outside 
the Predacon base.  The pod suffered some damage, as did the bot 
inside.  Inside was a transformer named Orchestra.  He hopped out of 
the pod, rubbing his head.
> 
>           "Uggh.....might have....difficulties.....playing 
the....perfect.......Symphony......The Symphony!!  Where is the 
Composer of the Symphony?  Without them, the universe will never hear 
the music it was destined to!!  Wait a minute, what could this base 
be doing here?  Why have I landed in such a strange place?  If that's 
a base, then there must be transformers stationed here!  I might have 
a chance to play music after all!!!" Orchestra said with joy, looking 
at the Preds' base.
> 
>           "If you can hear me, let me in!  Please, allow me to 
demonstrate my music to you!  I can play any type of music in the 
universe!!" Orchestra yelled, hoping that he would be welcomed kindly.
